com.mindgene.d20.common.game.trait.Gener.longDescription: You have a preferred fighting style that represents the type of soldier you are. Each fighting style is composed of various style techniques that you learn as you gain experience. You must pick one fighting style upon taking your first soldier level, and once made, this choice cannot be changed. Descriptions of the fighting styles you can choose from appear on pages 112â€“115.
com.mindgene.d20.common.game.trait.Gener.name: Primary Fighting Style
